Build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and live <S%H3427><s%> in them <S%H5193><s%>; and plant gardens <S%H1593><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit of them <S%H6529><s%>;

And seek <S%H1875><s%> the peace <S%H7965><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> where I have caused you to be carried away captives <S%H1540><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for it <S%H7965><s%>: for in the peace there shall you have peace <S%H7965><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Let not your prophets <S%H5030><s%> and your diviners <S%H7080><s%>, that be in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you <S%H5377><s%>, deceive you <S%H8085><s%>, neither listen to your dreams <S%H2472><s%> which you cause to be dreamed <S%H2492><s%>.

And you shall seek <S%H1245><s%> me <S%H4672><s%>, and find me <S%H1875><s%>, when you shall search for me with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>.

And I will be found <S%H4672><s%> of you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and I will turn away <S%H7725><s%> your captivity <S%H7622><s%>, and I will gather <S%H6908><s%> you from all the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and from all the places <S%H4725><s%> where I have driven <S%H5080><s%> you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and I will bring you again <S%H7725><s%> into the place <S%H4725><s%> from where I caused you to be carried away captive <S%H1540><s%>.
Because you have said <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has raised us up <S%H6965><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> in Babylon <S%H894><s%>;

Know that thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> that sits <S%H3427><s%> upon the throne <S%H3678><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and of all the people <S%H5971><s%> that dwells <S%H3427><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>, and of your brothers <S%H251><s%> that are not gone forth <S%H3318><s%> with you into captivity <S%H1473><s%>;

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will send upon them the sword <S%H2719><s%>, the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and will make <S%H5414><s%> them like vile <S%H8182><s%> figs <S%H8384><s%>, that cannot be eaten <S%H398><s%>, they are so evil <S%H7455><s%>.

And I will persecute <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H310><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, with the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and with the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them to be removed <S%H2189><s%> to all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, to be a curse <S%H423><s%>, and a astonishment <S%H8047><s%>, and a hissing <S%H8322><s%>, and a reproach <S%H2781><s%>, among all the nations <S%H1471><s%> where I have driven them <S%H5080><s%>:

Because they have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to my words <S%H1697><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which I sent <S%H7971><s%> unto them by my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, rising up early <S%H7925><s%> and sending <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H8085><s%>; but you would not hear, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> you therefore the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, all you of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, whom I have sent <S%H7971><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>:

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, of Ahab <S%H256><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kolaiah <S%H6964><s%>, and of Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, which prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> unto you in my name <S%H8034><s%>; Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I will deliver them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>; and he shall kill <S%H5221><s%> them before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>;

Thus shall you also speak <S%H559><s%> to Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus speaks <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Because you have sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> in your name <S%H8034><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%> that are at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and to Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and to all the priests <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

For therefore he sent <S%H7971><s%> unto us in Babylon <S%H894><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This <S%H1931><s%> captivity is long <S%H752><s%>: build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and live <S%H3427><s%> in them <S%H5193><s%>; and plant gardens <S%H1593><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit of them <S%H6529><s%>.

Then came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Send <S%H7971><s%> to all them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%>; Because that Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> has prophesied <S%H5012><s%> unto you <S%H7971><s%>, and I sent him not <S%H982><s%>, and he caused you to trust in a lie <S%H8267><s%>:

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Behold <S%H6485><s%>, I will punish Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%>, and his seed <S%H2233><s%>: he shall not have a man <S%H376><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>; neither shall he behold <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> that I will do <S%H6213><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; because he has taught <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
